name: AivaSmartBuildingv2
0:
”Alexa, turn the lights on.”
”Alexa, close the shades.”
”Alexa, turn on the television.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: This skill enables user to operate Aiva Smarthome devices using Alexa. You can ask to turn on or off smart home enabled devices such as lights, shades, thermostats, and more. This skill is designed to work with Alexa for Hospitality.
